mapper.select: SELECT cor.check_out_record_id, c.NAME, cor.apply_time, CASE cor.type WHEN 0 THEN '正常退住' WHEN 1 THEN '死亡退住' WHEN 2 THEN '保留床位' END AS type, cor.reason, u.user_name check_name, cor.examine_time, CASE cor.state WHEN 0 THEN '已提交' WHEN 1 THEN '通过' WHEN 2 THEN '未通过' END AS state FROM t_check_out_record cor JOIN t_customer c ON c.customer_id = cor.customer_id JOIN t_user u ON u.user_id = cor.admin_id WHERE c.customer_id = #{customerId}
